transcript:
the school system wants to keep you
broke it was built to pump out good
employees that do what they're told if
you look at school it is the complete
opposite of what it takes to be
successful in real life don't make
mistakes do as you're told take tests by
yourself there's only one right answer
to a problem that's not right when
you're trying to be successful to be
successful in this world you have to
make mistakes you need to work with
others and brainstorm you need to find
Synergy and there's so many right
answers in life not just one so we come
out of our school system paralyzed and
scared to death to make mistakes but if
you want my honest opinion I think the
school system kills a child's creativity
and that's one of the greatest tragedies
in this world
